channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 08:08 Driven Alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:08 Driven Alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.#Sumy_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:06 Fragrant anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 08:06 Fragrant anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
